name: Escape The Dark (sualexander)
description:
This is "Escape the Dark", a game where you are constantly running out of light. Try to escape the cave systems and uncover what happened to this ancient society through the cave paintings! When your light runs out try to make your way back to your last lit up campfire.
This is a puzzle/platformer/exploration game. Explore, light up campfires, and escape the tunnels.

NOTE: We recommend wearing headphones for the best experience

How To Play:
Arrow keys to move around

To light campfires press up arrows
Levers - F

Space to Jump

Your torch light will slowly run out as you go on, go to campfires to replenish it. Levers will open certain doors, not necessarily the one closest to it.
Credits:

Made by Micha Rand, Rhea Madhogarhia, Alex Su, Aiden Schiller and Rohan Madhogarhia for the HW 2020 Game Jam
